name: csv_generation
description: Generate CSV parameters file for lookup table generation

docker.command: bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y git python3-tk && pip install numpy scipy matplotlib pandas && mkdir -p /project_ghent/rsegawa && cd /project_ghent/rsegawa && echo "Cloning repository..." && rm -rf URENIMOD-lookups && git clone https://github.com/whizzkid-ox/URENIMOD-lookups.git && cd URENIMOD-lookups && echo "Running CSV generation..." && python /project_ghent/rsegawa/URENIMOD-lookups/lookup_parameters_csv.py && echo "CSV generation completed!" && echo "Generated CSV file:" && find /project_ghent/rsegawa/URENIMOD-lookups/params_csv -name "lookup_parameters_*.csv" -type f && sleep 60'
